acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused person namely Shri Member Ingti is produced from Jail Hazot. He is again remanded till next date. Copy furnished to him.       The accused has expressed his inability to appoint any lawyer to defend him. Hence Mr. Pran Sharma advocate, Diphu Bar Association is hereby appointed as a legal aid counsel from the panel prepared by DLSA, Karbi Anglong Diphu to defend him. Inform Accordingly.      Heard submissions duly advanced by the leaned lawyer of both sides as well case record I find that there is a ground for presuming that the accused committed offence punishable under section 448 IPC/8 of the POCSO Act and accordingly charge is framed. The particulars of the offences charged is duly read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issue summons to PWS.

Accused Member Engti is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next date. No PW is present. Issue fresh summons to PWs.         Seen the petition filed by one Sri Hawardson Engti praying for allowing the accused Sri Member Engti to go on bail on the ground stated in the petition. Perused the case record. Considering all aspects, the bail prayer is allowed. Accordingly the accused Sri Member Engti is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 10,000/- with a local surety of like amount.        Fixing 03.12.2019 for evidence.

PO is on leave.     Accused Member Engti is absent with step showing cause of his absence vide petition No. 2556/19, and the same is allowed    PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.         Fixing 12.02.20 for Evidence
CR is received on transfer from the court of Hon, Session Judge, K/A for disposal.        Accd is present.       PWs absent, summons issued to PWs not returned, issue fresh summons to PWS.
